The GPRS serial modem has a PCI ID of 14e4:4322 (18de:0002). ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
06:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Broadcom Corporation BCM4306 802.11b/g Wireless LAN Controller [14e4:4320] (rev 03)
        Subsystem: Device [18de:0002]
        Flags: bus master, fast devsel, latency 64, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=8K]
        Kernel driver in use: b43-pci-bridge

06:00.1 Serial controller [0700]: Broadcom Corporation BCM4322 802.11bgn Wireless Network Controller [14e4:4322] (rev 03) (prog-if 02 [16550])
        Subsystem: Device [18de:0002]
        Flags: fast devsel, IRQ 19
        I/O ports at 4000 [size=256]
        Kernel driver in use: serial
